Hint: It wasn't, in many cases it was lower.

You do recall the fact that back in S4 you could achieve the following.

You could achieve 33 armor penetration using armor penetration marks + youmuu ghost blade and have 6% magic AND 6% armor penetration from the offensive tree.
Mind you, this was AFTER last whisper was changed to function AFTER flat penetration instead of before and worked on bonus armor ONLY.
This was also in an era where the base armor/base MR of champions was LOWER because of the existence of flat armor/MR runes.
Oh, and black cleaver removed more armor too back then.


When lethality was introduced base armor/MR was incresaed to compensate. In S6 you could get about 80 lethality or so and then that was reduced.

Mages do rediculous damage, Don't rebuttle with a jab at assassins because frankly assassins do too much damage too. 

nothing in mid lane is fun to fight against and frankly gutting the entire lane's item patterns both for AD and AP champs would be preferred... hell give top lane a pass too. 

Bruisers, tanks, Mages, and assassins all could use item reworks. maybe dabble in adaptive stats on **some** items to make class specific without having to separate AD vs AP champs, But don't defend MPEN like it's not just more cancer in this game that needs to be reworked or replaced

To be fair I did say, "items that work like Armor Pen" which implies that the item is not necessarily Armor Pen related, but can bypass armor. Witch {{item:3031}} (Though soon to be changed), {{item:1419}}, and {{item:3153}} kinda do.

{{item:3020}} {{item:3165}} do not equal to the same total of all those Armor Pen items. {{item:3135}} does not even deal that well with Armor stacking, even if I build that against a bruiser or tank it would bounce right off. Making mages already weak as hell towards Magic Resist, because they do not have any reliable itemization against Magic Resist stacking. 

By the way, if you get one shot by a Lux. There is a fat chance that you did not build MR or you just let her get fed and get to a point were your MR cannot match her AP and MP. Which can happen. That I will say is entirely your fault, not the itemization, sorry.

Anyways, GL HF
